name: part_006
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026】Glitter of Love⧸誕生日記念3DLIVE【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [zzVcTQOdLZE]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka and Takane Lui performing the song 'PHOENIX PRAYER' on a virtual stage.

subtitles.original: 煌々と続くショートショート
subtitles.english: Brightly shining, the short stories continue.

subtitles.original: 喪失は絶対で意図的
subtitles.english: The loss is absolute and intentional.

subtitles.original: 今夜はリンカーネーション 悲しみが
subtitles.english: Tonight is a reincarnation, where sadness...

subtitles.original: 混沌の子守唄 歌ってるよ
subtitles.english: ...is singing a chaotic lullaby.

subtitles.original: 運命に理由があるのならば
subtitles.english: If there is a reason for this fate,

subtitles.original: 全てを賭けてみたいの
subtitles.english: I want to bet everything on it.

subtitles.original: 貴方を守りたい
subtitles.english: I want to protect you.

subtitles.original: どこまでも高く飛べるわ
subtitles.english: I can fly higher than anywhere.

subtitles.original: どこまでも強く強くなれるわ
subtitles.english: I can become stronger and stronger, no matter how far.

subtitles.original: 信じて 私に出会えた奇跡
subtitles.english: Believe in the miracle that we met.

subtitles.original: 火に開くは不死鳥の羽根 解いて
subtitles.english: Unfurl the wings of the phoenix that open in the fire.

subtitles.original: 貴方のドグマ
subtitles.english: Your dogma.

subtitles.original: 高く高く眼差し 泣きたくなるの
subtitles.english: High, so high, your gaze makes me want to cry.

subtitles.original: Flashback flashback 振り解け
subtitles.english: Flashback, flashback, shake it off.

subtitles.original: Asset 挑み続けろ
subtitles.english: Asset, keep on challenging.

subtitles.original: 飄々と佇むホットスポット
subtitles.english: Standing aloof at the hot spot.

subtitles.original: 私が必要でしょ
subtitles.english: You need me, don't you?

subtitles.original: 今夜はリンカーネーション 正しさが
subtitles.english: Tonight is a reincarnation, where righteousness...

subtitles.original: 焦れったい最前線に押し出すよ
subtitles.english: ...pushes us to the frustrating front lines.

subtitles.original: 運命に理由があるのならば
subtitles.english: If there is a reason for this fate,

subtitles.original: 優しい世界をあげたい
subtitles.english: I want to give you a gentle world.

subtitles.original: 貴方を包むわ
subtitles.english: I will wrap around you.

subtitles.original: どこまでも速く射抜くわ
subtitles.english: I will pierce through faster than anywhere.

subtitles.original: どこまでも熱く熱く焦がすわ
subtitles.english: I will burn hotter and hotter, no matter how far.

subtitles.original: 信じて 私に出会えた奇跡
subtitles.english: Believe in the miracle that we met.

subtitles.original: 火に開くは不死鳥の羽根 解いて
subtitles.english: Unfurl the wings of the phoenix that open in the fire.

subtitles.original: 貴方のドグマ
subtitles.english: Your dogma.

subtitles.original: 高く高く肩越し 光を見せて
subtitles.english: High, so high, show me the light over my shoulder.

subtitles.original: Flashback flashback 許さない
subtitles.english: Flashback, flashback, I won't forgive.

subtitles.original: Regret 進み続けろ
subtitles.english: Regret, keep moving forward.

subtitles.original: 尽きるまで
subtitles.english: Until I burn out...

subtitles.original: 側にいると鼓動が速くて 眩暈がする
subtitles.english: ...when I'm by your side, my heart races and I get dizzy.

subtitles.original: 全て捧げる もう決めたの
subtitles.english: I'll dedicate everything, I've already decided...

subtitles.original: 最後のチャンスだから
subtitles.english: ...because this is the last chance.

subtitles.original: もう離さない
subtitles.english: I won't let go anymore.

subtitles.original: 貴方に燃ゆる未来の風
subtitles.english: Ride the wind of the future...

subtitles.original: 跨って行け
subtitles.english: ...that burns for you.

subtitles.original: どこまでも高く飛べるわ
subtitles.english: I can fly higher than anywhere.

subtitles.original: どこまでも強く強くなれるわ
subtitles.english: I can become stronger and stronger, no matter how far.

subtitles.original: 信じて 私に出会えた奇跡
subtitles.english: Believe in the miracle that we met.

subtitles.original: 闇をも望めば輝きにするから
subtitles.english: If you desire it, I'll turn even the darkness into radiance.

subtitles.original: 火に開くは不死鳥の羽根 解いて
subtitles.english: Unfurl the wings of the phoenix that open in the fire.

subtitles.original: 貴方のドグマ
subtitles.english: Your dogma.

subtitles.original: 高く高く眼差し 泣きたくなるの
subtitles.english: High, so high, your gaze makes me want to cry.

subtitles.original: Flashback flashback 振り解け
subtitles.english: Flashback, flashback, shake it off.

subtitles.original: Asset 挑み続けろ
subtitles.english: Asset, keep on challenging.

subtitles.original: 高く高く肩越し 光を見せて
subtitles.english: High, so high, show me the light over my shoulder.

subtitles.original: Flashback flashback 許さない
subtitles.english: Flashback, flashback, I won't forgive.

subtitles.original: Regret 進み続けろ
subtitles.english: Regret, keep moving forward.
